channel.title: natural-language-processing on Isaac Changhau
channel.description: Recent content in natural-language-processing on Isaac Changhau

item.title: PrimeNet: Human-inspired Framework for Commonsense Knowledge Representation and Reasoning
item.description: A human-inspired framework for commonsense knowledge representation and reasoning.

item.title: Behavioural Understanding and Narrative Descriptions from Videos
item.description: An effectively and flexibly multimodal system to analyze and narrate real world events captured in video.

item.title: Neural Sequence Labeling
item.description: An unified and accurate deep learning based approach for various sequence labeling tasks such as POS, Chunking, NER, SRL, Punctuation Restoration and etc.

item.title: PTransE -- Modeling Relation Paths for Representation Learning of Knowledge Bases
item.description: An efficient and advanced deep learning approach to learn relational representation.

item.title: TransX: Embedding Entities and Relationships of Multi-relational Data
item.description: Summarization of several similar algorithms to learn relational representation.

item.title: Analyzing Wolf Warrior II Movie Comments using Python
item.description: Tutorial to analyze 170000+ movie comments of Wolf Warrior II from Douban website.

item.title: Beam Search Algorithms in Sequence to Sequence
item.description: Introduction of beam search algorithms in sequence to seqeunce framework.

item.title: Seq2Seq Learning and Neural Conversational Model
item.description: Introduction of sequence to sequence learning and its application in conversation generation.

item.title: Neural Responding Machine for Short-Text Conversation -- Summary
item.description: A simple conversation system using seq2seq encoder-decoder framework with attention mechanism.

item.title: Word2Vecf -- Dependency-Based Word Embeddings and Lexical Substitute
item.description: Summarization of dependency-based word embeddings algorithms and its application in lexical substitution.

item.title: Word2Vec -- Mathematical Principles and Java Implementation
item.description: Summarization of word2vec algorithms, mathematical principles and its implementation.
